name: ReadFeeder
overview:
ReadFeeder recommends books based on reviews and mentions in important blogs.

ReadFeeder monitors a curated collection of well-regarded blogs for book mentions,Â and ranks the books by number of mentions. For each book ReadFeeder aggregates credited, linked excerpts from the relevant blogposts, so the reader can find out what the expert bloggers are saying about the book at a glance. Like Seth Godin’s Linchpin exploding on ReadFeeder with 25 blogs and 36 posts â€“ it is a time when authors are bypassing traditional media and taking their books straight to the blogosphere, through this ReadFeeder captures a new must-read list.
